languages.text: "Некоторые ваши соплеменники все же знают толк в развлечениях. Полагаю, при плодовитости вашего рода найти замену погибшему скоту совсем несложно".
"Some of your kin do know how to enjoy themselves. Given the fecundity of your species, I suppose replacing dead livestock would not be difficult."
languages.original_text: "Некоторые ваши соплеменники все же знают толк в развлечениях. Полагаю, при плодовитости вашего рода найти замену погибшему скоту совсем несложно".

traits.locale_text: "Some of your kin do know how to enjoy themselves. Given the fecundity of your species, I suppose replacing dead livestock would not be difficult."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Some of your kin do know how to enjoy themselves. Given the fecundity of your species, I suppose replacing dead livestock would not be difficult."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Some of your kin do know how to enjoy themselves. Given the fecundity of your species, I suppose replacing dead livestock would not be difficult."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Some of your kin do know how to enjoy themselves. Given the fecundity of your species, I suppose replacing dead livestock would not be difficult."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “你的一部分族人确实知道该如何享受生活。考虑到你的族群出色的繁殖能力，我猜想，替换那群死去的牲畜并不是件难事。”
languages.original_text: "Some of your kin do know how to enjoy themselves. Given the fecundity of your species, I suppose replacing dead livestock would not be difficult."

traits.locale_text: “你的一部分族人确实知道该如何享受生活。考虑到你的族群出色的繁殖能力，我猜想，替换那群死去的牲畜并不是件难事。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Au moins, j'ai pu constater que certains des vôtres savent passer du bon temps. Vu la fécondité de votre espèce, j'imagine que remplacer le bétail mort ne devrait pas s'avérer trop difficile. »
languages.original_text: "Some of your kin do know how to enjoy themselves. Given the fecundity of your species, I suppose replacing dead livestock would not be difficult."

traits.locale_text: « Au moins, j'ai pu constater que certains des vôtres savent passer du bon temps. Vu la fécondité de votre espèce, j'imagine que remplacer le bétail mort ne devrait pas s'avérer trop difficile. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Algunos de los vuestros saben disfrutar, por lo que veo. Dada la fecundidad de vuestra especie, imagino que sustituir el ganado sacrificado no será difícil».
languages.original_text: "Some of your kin do know how to enjoy themselves. Given the fecundity of your species, I suppose replacing dead livestock would not be difficult."

traits.locale_text: «Algunos de los vuestros saben disfrutar, por lo que veo. Dada la fecundidad de vuestra especie, imagino que sustituir el ganado sacrificado no será difícil».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「お前たちの同胞にも、楽しみ方をよくわかってる奴がいるんだな。種の繁殖力を与えられてる分、死んだ家畜の交換も難しくないんだろ」
languages.original_text: "Some of your kin do know how to enjoy themselves. Given the fecundity of your species, I suppose replacing dead livestock would not be difficult."

traits.locale_text: 「お前たちの同胞にも、楽しみ方をよくわかってる奴がいるんだな。種の繁殖力を与えられてる分、死んだ家畜の交換も難しくないんだろ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Einige Eurer Verwandten wissen tatsächlich, wie man sich amüsiert. Angesichts der Fruchtbarkeit Eurer Spezies dürfte es nicht schwierig sein, totes Vieh zu ersetzen."
languages.original_text: "Some of your kin do know how to enjoy themselves. Given the fecundity of your species, I suppose replacing dead livestock would not be difficult."

traits.locale_text: "Einige Eurer Verwandten wissen tatsächlich, wie man sich amüsiert. Angesichts der Fruchtbarkeit Eurer Spezies dürfte es nicht schwierig sein, totes Vieh zu ersetzen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Some of your kin do know how to enjoy themselves. Given the fecundity of your species, I suppose replacing dead livestock would not be difficult."

languages.text: "Soydaşlarının kimisi eğlenmeyi iyi biliyor. Türünün doğurganlık oranını düşününce ölen damızlıkların yerine yenisini koymak zor olmamalı."
languages.original_text: "Some of your kin do know how to enjoy themselves. Given the fecundity of your species, I suppose replacing dead livestock would not be difficult."

traits.locale_text: "Soydaşlarından bazıları eğlenmeyi iyi biliyor. Türünün doğurganlık oranını düşününce ölen besi hayvanlarının yerine yenisini koymak zor olmamalı."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
